Simplify your Omegle experience with this Chrome extension. features :
⭐Trace omegle video chat location (country and city).
⭐ FREE
⭐NO Ban
⭐NO lag
⭐Quick one-button message.
⭐ No Omegle icon on partner screen.

Let's stop these users on Omegle who engage in inappropriate behavior such as nudity and causing disturbances during video chats.

To acquire information about the individuals using Omegle video chat, you can utilize this extension that reveals the location of the person you're chatting with. Simply install the extension and initiate your Omegle video chat session using an activation code (it's free). Within the chat window, you will be able to view the user's location information.
